feed.no_discussions: No discussions yet. Be the first to start one!
feed.no_posts: No posts yet. Be the first to share something!

actions.delete_post_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
actions.delete_comment_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.

users_table.verify_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to verify {{username}}? This will display a verified badge next to their name.
users_table.unverify_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove verification from {{username}}? This will remove their verified badge.
users_table.restore_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to restore {{username}}'s account?
users_table.ban_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to ban {{username}}? This will prevent them from accessing most features.
users_table.delete_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{username}}? This action cannot be undone and will delete all of the user's posts, comments, and other data.
users_table.make_admin_confirm: Are you sure you want to make {{username}} an admin? This will give them administrative privileges.
users_table.make_owner_confirm: Are you sure you want to promote {{username}} to Owner? This grants them full system access.
users_table.remove_owner_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove Owner status from {{username}}? They will be demoted to an Admin.
users_table.remove_admin_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}}'s admin privileges? They will be demoted to a regular user.

reports_table.resolve_desc: Are you sure you want to resolve this report? This will delete the reported content.
reports_table.reject_desc: Are you sure you want to reject this report? The reported content will remain.

ai_generator.title: AI Post Generator
ai_generator.description: Select a feed, upload an image (optional), and let AI write for you.
ai_generator.topic_placeholder: E.g., Morning Coffee, Tech Trends, Weekend Vibes...
ai_generator.edit_placeholder: You can edit the text here before posting...
ai_generator.toast_generated_desc: Your perfect post is ready. You can now edit or post it.
ai_generator.toast_posted_desc: Your post is now live on the feed.

news.title: Share News
news.headline: Headline
news.placeholder: Write your news article here. Please ensure it's factual and properly sourced.
news.success_desc: Your news article has been posted successfully.

entertainment.title: Share Something Fun
entertainment.placeholder: Share a joke, a funny story, or something interesting!
entertainment.success_desc: Your entertainment post has been shared successfully.

discussion.title: Start a Discussion
discussion.success_desc: Your discussion has been posted successfully.

create.title: Create a Community
create.subtitle: Build a space for people to share and discuss common interests.
create.feed_hint: Select at least one feed type for your community.
create.restriction_desc: You need at least 200 reputation to create a community.

page.not_found_desc: The community you are looking for does not exist.
page.join_prompt: Join this community to start posting and interacting!
page.member_of: You are now a member of {{name}}
page.empty_posts_desc: Be the first to share something!

mod_panel.title: Moderator Panel
mod_panel.no_communities: You are not moderating any communities.

overview.title: Community Overview
overview.select_prompt: Select a tab to manage your community.

reports.updated_desc: The report status has been updated.

kick_dialog.title: Kick Member?
kick_dialog.desc: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from the community? They can join again later.

bans.banned_desc: The user has been banned from the community.

ban_dialog.title: Ban User from Community
ban_dialog.desc: Prevent a user from posting or commenting in this community.

unban_dialog.title: Unban User?
unban_dialog.desc: This will restore access for {{name}} to the community.

add_dialog.title: Add Moderator
add_dialog.desc: Grant moderation privileges. Only the Owner can do this.

communities_feed.header_desc: Posts from communities you have joined
communities_feed.no_joined: You haven't joined any communities yet.
communities_feed.no_posts_desc: Join communities to see their posts here, or create your own community!

ai_gen_errors.topic_missing: Please enter a topic for the post.

news_page.no_posts_desc: No news articles yet. Be the first to share important news!

entertainment_page.no_posts_desc: No entertainment posts yet. Share something fun to get started!
